SELECT p.product_no, b.brand_name, p.product, p.price, p.regdate, p.discount, p.is_shop_pickup, p.is_shop_delivery, ( SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG( JSON_OBJECT( 'uuid', i.uuid, 'path', i.path, 'image_product_no', i.product_no, 'type', i.type ) ) FROM tbl_p_image i WHERE p.product_no = i.product_no AND i.type LIKE '%detail%' ) AS image_details, ( SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG( JSON_OBJECT( 'uuid', i.uuid, 'path', i.path, 'image_product_no', i.product_no, 'type', i.type ) ) FROM tbl_p_image i WHERE p.product_no = i.product_no AND i.type LIKE '%image_600%' ) AS image_prdts, ( SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG( JSON_OBJECT( 'option_no', o.option_no, 'option_name', o.name, 'option_count', o.count ) ) FROM tbl_p_option o WHERE p.product_no = o.product_no ) AS product_options FROM tbl_product p LEFT JOIN tbl_p_brand b ON p.brand_no = b.brand_no WHERE p.product_no = #{product_no} GROUP BY p.product_no, b.brand_name, p.product, p.price, p.regdate, p.discount, p.is_shop_pickup, p.is_shop_delivery ORDER BY p.product_no; -- You might need to adjust the ORDER BY clause based on your sorting requirements
SELECT p.product_no, p.brand_no, pb.brand_name, p.product, p.price, p.regdate, p.discount, p.is_shop_pickup, p.is_shop_delivery, i.path, i.product_no AS image_product_no, i.type FROM tbl_product p LEFT JOIN tbl_p_image i ON p.product_no = i.product_no LEFT JOIN tbl_p_brand pb ON p.brand_no = pb.brand_no WHERE i.type = 'image_300';
